entry.title: [Global][Additionnal services] - RTM repositories removal
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 22, 09:00 - 09:30 UTC

Jun 21, 08:38 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/06/2023 09:00 UTC
End time : 22/06/2023 09:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement: The objective of this maintenance is to remove RTM repositories which reached it's EOL (End-Of-Life).
Below you can find 2 guides in French and English for uninstalling RTM packages.
FR: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/fr-dedicated-servers-uninstall-rtm?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0058490
EN: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-dedicated-servers-uninstall-rtm?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0058485

entry.title: [RBX6][Dedicated Servers] - 46E24
entry.content:
Jun 21, 15:02 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 21/06/2023 5:17 UTC
End Time : 21/06/2023 14:58 UTC
Root cause : A water cooling issue caused the problem
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 21, 07:46 UTC
Identified - Start time : 21/06/2023 5:17 UTC
Service impact : Some servers are temporarily unreachable in rack 46E24
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: VPS - BHS6 - host375716

Jun 20, 19:09 UTC

Jun 20, 13:03 UTC

host375716
